propositions.original_proposition: In 2022-2023, the boroughs of Camden and Westminster have the highest library density, accounting for 25% of all libraries in London.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Camden and Westminster stand out for having the densest concentration of libraries, making up a significant portion of London's total.
propositions.chart_description: Comparison of library density across London boroughs for 2022-2023.
propositions.reasoning: A bar chart effectively compares the library density across different boroughs, highlighting Camden and Westminster's prominence.
tapas_questions: Which borough has the highest library density?
What percentage of libraries are in Camden?
How does Westminster compare to other boroughs in terms of library density?

propositions.original_proposition: Outer London boroughs collectively host 40% of the libraries despite covering 60% of the geographic area in 2022-2023.
